description: Capsa (Iustiniana) was an ancient city of Byzacium in north Africa.

names.details: Strabo describes Kapsa as, "τὸ γαζοφυλάκιον τοῦ Ἰουγούρθα" or the "Treasure-hold of Iugurtha".
